sql-select.name: GetInstanceDatabasesList
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT MIN(tSID.[DatabaseName]) AS [NodeUName] ,tSID.[DatabaseId] AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,'#080808' AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,MIN(tSID.[DatabaseName]) AS [DatabaseName] ,tSID.[DatabaseId] AS [DatabaseId] FROM [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabaseSize] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] tSID ON tSID.[h_ServerInstance_id] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND tSID.[DatabaseId] = t.[DatabaseId] WHERE t.[EventTime] > ( SELECT DATETIME(MAX(t.[EventTime]), @strDateTimeModifier) FROM [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabaseSize] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] tSID ON tSID.[h_ServerInstance_id] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND tSID.[DatabaseId] = t.[DatabaseId] ) GROUP BY tSID.[DatabaseId] ORDER BY tSID.[DatabaseName] ASC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceDatabasesSizeByDatabaseMonth
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUName] ,strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,'#080808' AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,MIN(t.[DatabaseId]) AS [DatabaseId] ,date(MIN(t.[EventDay]),'start of month') AS [EventDayMin] ,date(MIN(t.[EventDay]),'start of month','+1 month','-1 day') AS [EventDayMax] FROM [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabaseSize] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE t.[DatabaseId] = @DatabaseId AND t.[EventTime] > ( SELECT DATETIME(MAX(t.[EventTime]), @strDateTimeModifier) FROM [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabaseSize] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id ) GROUP BY strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) ORDER BY strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) DESC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceDatabasesSizeMonth
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUName] ,strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,'#080808' AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,date(MIN(t.[EventDay]),'start of month') AS [EventDayMin] ,date(MIN(t.[EventDay]),'start of month','+1 month','-1 day') AS [EventDayMax] FROM [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabaseSize] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE t.[EventTime] > ( SELECT DATETIME(MAX(t.[EventTime]), @strDateTimeModifier) FROM [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabaseSize] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id ) GROUP BY strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) ORDER BY strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) DESC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceDatabasesSizeDays
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT strftime('%Y%m%d', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUName] ,strftime('%Y%m%d', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,CASE WHEN (strftime('%w', t.[EventDay]) = '0') THEN '#CC0000' ELSE '#080808' END AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,MIN(t.[EventDay]) AS [EventDayMin] ,MAX(t.[EventDay]) AS [EventDayMax] FROM [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabaseSize] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE t.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) GROUP BY strftime('%Y%m%d', t.[EventDay]) ORDER BY strftime('%Y%m%d', t.[EventDay]) DESC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceDatabasesSizeByDatabase
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT t.[EventDay] AS [EventDay] ,strftime('%d', t.[EventDay]) AS [EventDayDD] ,tSID.[DatabaseName] AS [DatabaseName] ,MAX(t.[DatabaseSizeMB]) AS [SizeMB] ,MAX(t.[DatabaseDataSizeMB] - t.[DatabaseDataSizeUsedMB]) AS [DataFree] ,MAX(t.[DatabaseDataSizeUsedMB]) AS [DataUsed] ,MAX(t.[DatabaseLogSizeMB] - t.[DatabaseLogSizeUsedMB]) AS [LogFree] ,MAX(t.[DatabaseLogSizeUsedMB]) AS [LogUsed] FROM [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabaseSize] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] tSID ON tSID.[h_ServerInstance_id] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND tSID.[DatabaseId] = t.[DatabaseId] WHERE t.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) AND t.[DatabaseId] = @DatabaseId GROUP BY t.[EventDay] ,tSID.[DatabaseName] ORDER BY t.[EventDay] ASC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceDatabasesSize
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT t.[EventDay] AS [EventDay] ,tSID.[DatabaseName] AS [DatabaseName] ,MIN(t.[DatabaseSizeMB]) AS [DatabaseSizeMB] ,MIN(t.[DatabaseDataSizeMB]) AS [DatabaseDataSizeMB] ,MIN(t.[DatabaseDataSizeUsedMB]) AS [DatabaseDataSizeUsedMB] ,MIN(t.[DatabaseLogSizeMB]) AS [DatabaseLogSizeMB] ,MIN(t.[DatabaseLogSizeUsedMB]) AS [DatabaseLogSizeUsedMB] FROM [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabaseSize] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] tSID ON tSID.[h_ServerInstance_id] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND tSID.[DatabaseId] = t.[DatabaseId] WHERE t.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) GROUP BY tSID.[DatabaseName] ORDER BY tSID.[DatabaseName] ASC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceDatabasesSizeSummary
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT t.[EventDay] AS [EventDay] ,SUM(t.[DatabaseSizeMB]) AS [DatabaseSizeMB] ,SUM(t.[DatabaseDataSizeMB]) AS [DatabaseDataSizeMB] ,SUM(t.[DatabaseDataSizeUsedMB]) AS [DatabaseDataSizeUsedMB] ,SUM(t.[DatabaseLogSizeMB]) AS [DatabaseLogSizeMB] ,SUM(t.[DatabaseLogSizeUsedMB]) AS [DatabaseLogSizeUsedMB] FROM ( SELECT t.[EventDay] AS [EventDay] ,tSID.[DatabaseName] AS [DatabaseName] ,MIN(t.[DatabaseSizeMB]) AS [DatabaseSizeMB] ,MIN(t.[DatabaseDataSizeMB]) AS [DatabaseDataSizeMB] ,MIN(t.[DatabaseDataSizeUsedMB]) AS [DatabaseDataSizeUsedMB] ,MIN(t.[DatabaseLogSizeMB]) AS [DatabaseLogSizeMB] ,MIN(t.[DatabaseLogSizeUsedMB]) AS [DatabaseLogSizeUsedMB] FROM [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabaseSize] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] tSID ON tSID.[h_ServerInstance_id] = hSI.[rowid] AND tSID.[DatabaseId] = t.[DatabaseId] WHERE t.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) GROUP BY tSID.[DatabaseName] ,t.[EventDay] ) t GROUP BY t.[EventDay] ORDER BY t.[EventDay] ASC ;
